game.name: Magic Dash
game.description:
This time a small and cute dash has come to you for help! Will you come forward to guide it run through the amazing blocky world? Join Magic Dash game and be prepared to control this charming and adorable dash on a road that is full of deadly obstacles! This dash has a dream of covering a long distance over this endless road. Put your fingers on your keyboard of your computer or tap the screen of your mobile phone to make it jump and run!

Your objective in this HTML5 platform game is to help dash jump over the obstacles as it will keep running automatically. Jump or roll to avoid all of the obstacles that you see along the way! Do not forget to grab the bonuses on the road to boost its strength. Plan a strategy to keep it running without stopping on that road in this cool runner challenge! You have to work hard to create your best score and get your name written on the top of the leaderboard.

Swipe down to roll your character and click or tap to make it jump in this online skill-arcade game backed with colourful graphics! Try to collect as many points as you can to be on the top of the leader board! Good luck to play like a champion in this addicting endless runner! The best part is that you do not need to download games in your device when you stay connected with us. So, have fun alone or with your family to kill your boring hours!
